text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_1: Welcome to the Metroid: Samus Returns Randomizer!|Here are some useful tips to help you on your journey.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_2: All of the hazardous liquid has been drained. You can thus freely explore the planet.|Metroids now also drop items.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_3: In this randomizer, you need to collect all Metroid DNA, find the Baby, and then fight Proteus Ridley at your ship to leave the planet.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_4: With your current configuration, you need to find 10 DNA. It can be found on Standard Metroids and on Stronger Metroids.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_5: You may freely travel between Surface and Area 8.|Once you have collected all the required DNA, going from Area 8 to Surface will force a confrontation with Proteus Ridley.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_6: All the Chozo Seals have been repurposed to give hints on the region where a specific item is located.|Additionally, more distinct Chozo Seals have been placed that give hints on DNA locations.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_7: If you're interested in knowing more on how the DNA Seals work, you can check the Hint page in Randovania.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_8: Some other helpful tips:|You can warp to your starting location by cancelling the save at a Save Station.|Scan Pulse can be used to reveal more of your map.
text_patches.GUI_CUTSCENE_OPENING_9: If you still have more questions, check out the FAQ and Differences pages in Randovania.

spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Area 2 - Dam Entryway - Transport to Areas 1 and 3
Area 4 - Crystal Mines - Pink Crystal Preserve
spoiler_log.Charge Beam: Area 2 - Dam Interior - Varia Suit Chamber
spoiler_log.Beam Burst: Area 4 - Crystal Mines - Diggernaut Excavation Tunnels
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Area 2 - Dam Exterior - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena South West
Area 4 - Central Caves - Alpha+ Arena
spoiler_log.Progressive Jump: Surface - East - Energy Recharge Station Shaft
spoiler_log.Baby Metroid: Area 2 - Dam Interior - High Jump Boots Chamber
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 3: Area 3 - Factory Interior - Gamma Arena & Transport to Metroid Caverns East
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 4: Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Gamma Arena South
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 5: Area 1 - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena South East
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 8: Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Alpha+ Arena North

hints.text: The Charge Beam can be found in Area 2 - Dam Interior.
The Baby Metroid can be found in Area 2 - Dam Interior.
The Progressive Jump can be found in Surface - East.
The Power Bomb Launcher can be found in Area 2 - Dam Exterior.
The Bomb can be found in Area 8.
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 2 - Dam Exterior.
The Super Missile Launcher can be found in Area 6.
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 4 - Central Caves.
The Ice Beam can be found in Area 8.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 4 - Crystal Mines.
See you next mission!

Metroid DNA is located in Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Alpha+ Arena North.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 1 - Exterior Alpha Arena.

Metroid DNA is located in Area 1 - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena South East.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 7 - Omega+ Arena.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 3 - Factory Interior - Gamma Arena & Transport to Metroid Caverns East.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 7 - Omega Arena North.

Metroid DNA is located in Area 2 - Dam Entryway - Alpha+ Arena.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 5 - Tower Interior - Zeta+ Arena.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 5 - Tower Lobby - Alpha+ Arena.
The resulting decision of the Galactic Federation Council was immediate and unanimous.
This Chozo Seal did not give any useful DNA hints.
Metroid DNA is located in Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Gamma Arena South.
The Chozo have Sealed this hint away.
